mapper.insert: insert into `order` (order_id, product_name, options, table_no, quantity, order_date, order_time, date_time, robot_status, dong, ho, seq, orderer_name) values (#{orderId}, #{productName}, #{options}, #{tableNo}, #{quantity}, #{orderDate}, #{orderTime}, #{dateTime}, #{robotStatus}, #{dong}, #{ho}, #{seq}, #{ordererName});
